# Status Badges for README

Add these badges to the top of your README.md to show the status of various checks:

## Workflow Status Badges

```markdown
![Python CI](https://github.com/Rikorose/DeepFilterNet/actions/workflows/python_lint.yml/badge.svg)
![Rust CI](https://github.com/Rikorose/DeepFilterNet/actions/workflows/rust_lint.yml/badge.svg)
![CodeQL](https://github.com/Rikorose/DeepFilterNet/actions/workflows/codeql.yml/badge.svg)
![Tests](https://github.com/Rikorose/DeepFilterNet/actions/workflows/test_df.yml/badge.svg)
```

## Individual Badges

### Python CI
```markdown
[![Python CI](https://github.com/Rikorose/DeepFilterNet/actions/workflows/python_lint.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Rikorose/DeepFilterNet/actions/workflows/python_lint.yml)
```

### Rust CI
```markdown
[![Rust CI](https://github.com/Rikorose/DeepFilterNet/actions/workflows/rust_lint.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Rikorose/DeepFilterNet/actions/workflows/rust_lint.yml)
```

### CodeQL Security Scan
```markdown
[![CodeQL](https://github.com/Rikorose/DeepFilterNet/actions/workflows/codeql.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Rikorose/DeepFilterNet/actions/workflows/codeql.yml)
```

### Integration Tests
```markdown
[![Tests](https://github.com/Rikorose/DeepFilterNet/actions/workflows/test_df.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Rikorose/DeepFilterNet/actions/workflows/test_df.yml)
```

## Example Badge Section for README

Add this section near the top of README.md, right after the title:

```markdown
# DeepFilterNet

[![Python CI](https://github.com/Rikorose/DeepFilterNet/actions/workflows/python_lint.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Rikorose/DeepFilterNet/actions/workflows/python_lint.yml)
[![Rust CI](https://github.com/Rikorose/DeepFilterNet/actions/workflows/rust_lint.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Rikorose/DeepFilterNet/actions/workflows/rust_lint.yml)
[![CodeQL](https://github.com/Rikorose/DeepFilterNet/actions/workflows/codeql.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Rikorose/DeepFilterNet/actions/workflows/codeql.yml)
[![Tests](https://github.com/Rikorose/DeepFilterNet/actions/workflows/test_df.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Rikorose/DeepFilterNet/actions/workflows/test_df.yml)

A Low Complexity Speech Enhancement Framework for Full-Band Audio (48kHz) using on Deep Filtering.
```

## Note

Replace `Rikorose/DeepFilterNet` with the appropriate repository owner/name if different.
